part.content: CHAPTER II : THE NATIONAL LEGAL SERVICES AUTHORITY. Sec. 3 - 5.
CHAPTER III : STATE LEGAL SERVICES AUTHORITY. Sec. 6 - 11B.
CHAPTER IV : ENTITLEMENT TO LEGAL SERVICES. Sec. 12 - 13.
CHAPTER V : FINANCE, ACCOUNTS AND AUDIT. Sec. 14 - 18.
CHAPTER VIA : PRE-LITIGATION CONCILIATION AND SETTLEMENT. Sec. 22A - 22E.
